page.title: 14St. Audries Garage
page.content: At{St. Audries Garage}Mr Hooper has a small scrap yard of his own which is used for vehicles in minor crashes in and around St. Audries. He sells{new cars.}Sometimes he has to travel all over the country and sometimes abroad for the cars he wants. On average he sells twenty five cars in one month but some years if its a good year he can sell up to thirty five cars a month.Mr Hooper does{insure and M.O.T. cars.} His favourite car is a Ferrari because its a very good car. He has about sixty customers in a month roughly around the garage.He sells diesel cars as well as petrol.He sells cars from the price of Â£3.800 to Â£30.000.His buisness started from his great uncle about thirty years ago,so he carried on from that.
